#summary The acronym element represents an acronym.
#labels about-html,is-html-element,from-w3c

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HTMLReference HTML Reference] > [HTMLElements Elements] > *acronym element*

== Usage ==

For many years, authors have been confused about the difference between acronym and [AbbrElement <abbr>].  The `acronym` element is not included in [SpecificationHTML5 HTML 5] or [SpecificationXHTML2 XHTML 2]; use [AbbrElement <abbr>] instead. When <acronym> is used its full form can be viewed by mouse over.
